member.name: T:NHibernate.UserTypes.Oracle.BFileType
member.summary: NHibernate data type for Oracle-specific BFILE.
member.remarks:
The property of BFileType in hbm.xml file must have a pseudo "ROWID" column following the real column for NHibernate limit, for example:
<property type="NHibernate.UserTypes.Oracle.BFileType, NHibernate.UserTypes.Oracle" name="Image"> <column name="IMAGE" /> <column name="ROWID" /> </property>
